plot: Daisuke Asau is a high school student and a gifted artist—but he is currently suffering from a block, which keeps him from painting. His childhood friend, Amane Tachibana, who loves him deeply, persuades him to do a portrait of Yurina Kimikage, a girl with a heart condition, before Yurina undergoes surgery. In the process of rediscovering his art, Daisuke also realizes the love that he and Amane feel for each other.
